original_text: The temple that King Solomon built for the Lord was 27 metres long. It was 9 metres wide. It was 13.5 metres high.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 여호와를 위하여 건축한 성전은 길이가 육십 규빗이요 너비가 이십 규빗이요 높이가 삼십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: The temple that King Solomon built for the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 주님을 위해 건축한 성전은
